Description: Three tassel-like pieces and piece of woven linen from a wig.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Francis Llewellyn Griffith
Curator's comments: Joann Fletcher noted (12/7/1990) that the material, structure and dense weave of the net are unlike those of other wigs, and that this might instead have formed part of a tasselled garment (JHT).
